DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective study evaluate collaborative self-management intervention patient moderate severe COPD primary care population . To achieve objective investigator develop diagnostic treatment pathway management COPD primary care base national guideline focus patient self-management .
DOC.criteria: Current Exsmokers 40 year age Minimum 10 pack year smoke history Postbronchodilator FEV1 70 % less ( 4 puff Salbutamol ) Forced Expiratory Volume 1sec Forced Vital Capacity ( FEV1/FVC ) ratio 70 % less A history two exacerbation ( involve treatment and/or visit health care practitioner ) past 3 year OR 1 exacerbation past year Provides inform consent COPD exacerbation past 4 week Diagnosis asthma prior age 40 year Coexisting illness could interfere study result ( ie . Congestive Heart Failure exacerbation symptom ) Scheduled COPD rehabilitation A terminal illness
